com.qtplaf.library.database.rdbms

Class Cursor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qtplaf.library.database.rdbms.Cursor

  • public class Cursor
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to scan a view of a database.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas

      • beforeFirst

        public void beforeFirst()
                 throws java.sql.SQLException
        Move before the first record. The last record and page read are left unmodified.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If such an error occurs.

        public void afterLast()
               throws java.sql.SQLException

        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If such an error occurs.

      • nextPage

        public boolean nextPage()
                 throws java.sql.SQLException
        Moves to the next page of this cursor and sets the last page read to be retrieved with getPage.
        Returns:
        false if past the last record, true otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If such an error occurs.

        public boolean firstPage()
                  throws java.sql.SQLException

        Returns:
        false if no records present, true otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If such an error occurs.

      • getAllRecords

        public RecordSet getAllRecords()
                        throws java.sql.SQLException
        Returns all the records in this cursor as a RecordSet. The underlying resultset cursor is left open after the last record.
        Returns:
        All this cursor records in a RecordSet
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If such an error occurs.

      • getAllRecords

        public RecordSet getAllRecords(int maxRecords)
                        throws java.sql.SQLException
        Returns all the records in this cursor as a RecordSet, up to a maximum number of records. The underlying result set cursor is left open after the last record.
        Parameters:
        maxRecords - The maximum number of records to retrieve, 0 or less means all.
        Returns:
        All this cursor records in a RecordSet
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If such an error occurs.

      • getAllRecordsAndClose

        public RecordSet getAllRecordsAndClose()
                                throws java.sql.SQLException
        Returns all the records in this cursor as a RecordSet and close any used resource.
        Returns:
        All this cursor records in a RecordSet
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If such an error occurs.

      • getAllRecordsAndClose

        public RecordSet getAllRecordsAndClose(int maxRecords)
                                throws java.sql.SQLException
        Returns all the records in this cursor as a RecordSet up to a maximum number of records and close any used resource.
        Parameters:
        maxRecords - The maximum number of records to retrieve, 0 or less means all.
        Returns:
        All this cursor records in a RecordSet
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If such an error occurs.
